name: KUO-TOA ARCHPRIEST
senses: Darkvision 120 ft., Truesight 30 ft.; Passive Perception 19

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.text: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The kuo-toa makes three Strange Scepter attacks.

actions.name: Strange Scepter
actions.text: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. Hit: 20 (5d6 + 3) Lightning damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text: The kuo-toa casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14): At Will: Detect Magic, Thaumaturgy 1/Day Each: Destructive Wave, Divination, Hold Monster (level 6 version), Scrying, Tongues

bonus_actions.name: Shield of Faith (2/Day)
bonus_actions.text: The kuo-toa casts Shield of Faith, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.
